name: Sudoku Classic Edition
description:
Play Sudoku Classic Edition, the new generation of the most popular logic-based puzzle game on your mobile and tablet for free now!

Enjoy a clear, easy to read, and customizable Sudoku board that will follow you wherever you are, whenever you want!

Are you in a relaxing mood? Play the easy mode, sit back and enjoy.
Do you want more challenges and stimulating time? Play the hard mode and make as few mistakes as possible.
If you already a pro of Sudoku on paper, try the Expert mode and become the Sudoku Champion!


Features:
- 4 levels of difficulty adapted to everyone
- The most useful note system as if you were on paper
- Smart hints and eraser when you reach a roadblock and need a little help
- Unlimited Undo and mistakes count
- Crafted for smartphones and tablets for the best experience whenever you want, wherever you are

Remember the most important tips of Sudoku:
Tips 1: Each block, row and column on the board must contain every number between 1 and 9
Tips 2: Identify the sole candidate when all other numbers exists in either the current block, column or row
Tips 3: Do not hesitate to abuse the note option
Tips 4: When you are ready, change the difficulty for more challenges
Tips 4: Have fun!
